info.name: iotbc-Customer
info.description:
API calls for IoT Blockchain Adapter
Compatible with Composer 0.16.x

request.description: replace the sample url (https://iotbc-test-driver.mybluemix.net/i/schema/simple) with the url of your composer schema in json format. This call confirms it can be retrieved, and used by other methods in this folder
Create a new key for an user
Get all keys for an user
